Happy New Year. Mohamed Morsi President of the Arab Republic of Egypt
You will study your revolution for all peoples and supplement it, and in it the salvation of the homeland. And you shall go away ... "The President
My concern has not weakened, my resolve has not softened, and my confidence in victory is unlimited. #President
We will carry our homeland on our shoulders, and we will strengthen our revolution, uphold its values ​​and objectives, and take our Egypt out of that despotic tyranny. #President

PM: Let me wish you a happy and peaceful Eid. Eid Mubarak.
https://t.co/CgEW0q7Gna

What we carry from a letter makes their sentences and their throats in my mind the death throes of their despicable regime, which burns the country and drains the good and impoverishes its people and lost the place of the high homeland

Our revolution has gone through the historical turning points of the revolutions in the struggle between the peoples of interests and the men of principles to attain their proper place in the history of nations and peoples.
Every night my knowledge of the fragility of these pygmies deepens, and they become smaller in the eyes of the president
Every day that passes through me in this cell increases my faith in the justice of a cause we all carry, a revolution issue that we have begun to complete and complete.
The people of Greater Egypt every year, every year, you are revolutionaries, and you are free. #President
Barakaaitheri Fithr Eid ge thahuniyaa ariskuran. Eid Mubarak.
